import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Mail, Phone, MapPin, Clock, Send, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import useScrollAnimation from '../hooks/useScrollAnimation'; const Contact = () => { useScrollAnimation(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', company: '', service: '', message: '' }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the form data to your backend console.log('Form submitted:', formData); setSubmitted(true); setTimeout(() => { setSubmitted(false); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', company: '', service: '', message: '' }); }, 3000); }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: , title: 'Email Us', details: 'hello@enginerds.in', link: 'mailto:hello@enginerds.in', color: 'from-primary-500 to-primary-700' }, { icon: , title: 'Call Us', details: '+91 85679 27943', link: 'tel:+918567927943', color: 'from-green-500 to-green-700' }, { icon: , title: 'Visit Us', details: 'Bengaluru, Karnataka', link: '#', color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-700' }, { icon: , title: 'Working Hours', details: 'Monday - Friday · 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM IST', link: '#', color: 'from-orange-500 to-orange-700' } ]; const services = [ 'Web Development', 'Mobile App Development', 'Cloud Solutions', 'UI/UX Design', 'Data Analytics', 'Cybersecurity', 'Digital Marketing', 'AI & Machine Learning', 'Other' ]; const stats = [ { number: '92%', label: 'Projects from returning clients' }, { number: '18 hrs', label: 'Average project kickoff after hello' }, { number: '27', label: 'Specialists on the Enginerds roster' }, { number: '4.9/5', label: 'Client happiness score' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Home / Contact

Reach the Enginerds team directly

Tell us what you're building, what's stuck, or what you need a second brain for. Every note lands in our inbox - no auto-replies, just a real person getting back to you.

{/* Stats Banner */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Contact Info Cards */}
{contactInfo.map((info, index) => (
{info.icon}

{info.title}

{info.details}

 ))}
{/* Main Contact Section */}
{/* Contact Form */}

Drop us a quick hello

Share a few lines about your project, and one of our engineers will reply the same business day. If it's urgent, mention that and we'll jump the queue.

{submitted ? (

Thanks for reaching out

We'll review your note and get back to you shortly - usually within a couple of hours.

) : (
)}
{/* Additional Info */}

Why teams pick Enginerds

    {[ 'We speak in plain language and keep you in the loop', 'Seasoned engineers who have shipped dozens of products', 'Clear scopes, pricing, and progress updates from day one', 'Early prototypes so you can see and steer the work', 'Ongoing support long after launch', 'A partner mindset, not just another vendor' ].map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

A few things people ask us first

How quickly can we kick things off?

Once we chat and scope the work, we're usually rolling within a week. For smaller engagements we can often start sooner.

What do budgets typically look like?

We'll talk through what's best for your project - a fixed scope, a monthly retainer, or a blended model. No surprise invoices.

Do you stick around after launch?

Absolutely. Most clients keep us on for maintenance, new feature sprints, or team augmentation.

Can you collaborate with our in-house team?

That's our comfort zone. We plug into existing processes (Slack, Jira, Notion - whatever you use) and keep communication open.

{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Map Section */}

Visit our office

Swing by our studio - coffee's on us

We're adding an interactive map soon - for now, drop us a line and we'll share directions.

Bengaluru, Karnataka

{/* CTA Section */}

Let's build something real, together

Whether you need a full squad or a single expert, we're ready when you are.

Email Us Call Us
); }; export default Contact;
